featured.text: We even managed to visit an aboriginal village in the forest.

Which of the following is the best title for this passage? (A) Totem Poles, the Legends of Aboriginal Peoples (B) Totem Poles: Their Functions (C) Totem Poles, Symbols of Historical Resistance (D) Totem Poles: Their Designs 46.
Aboriginal carvers continue to carve totems as symbols of their cultural pride and clan kinship.
Totem poles are important expressions of specific Aboriginal cultures.

definition.en_def: Relating to the original inhabitants of a place.
definition.example: The aboriginal culture has a rich history and unique traditions.
